body_html: @hadamschek Just curious, how did you install the gpu version? e.g via standard pip install or using the nightly build? If you are using the standard pip install for gpu, it is not stable. If you have not tried the nightly build, perhaps you can install it with its latest stable version.
body_text: @hadamschek Just curious, how did you install the gpu version? e.g via standard pip install or using the nightly build? If you are using the standard pip install for gpu, it is not stable. If you have not tried the nightly build, perhaps you can install it with its latest stable version.
body: @hadamschek Just curious, how did you install the gpu version? e.g via standard pip install or using the nightly build? If you are using the standard pip install for gpu, it is not stable. If you have not tried the nightly build, perhaps you can install it with its latest stable version.
